languages.text: {n}Пролитая кровь становится последней каплей. Толпа взрывается воем. Они больше не слышат меня — они во власти врага.{/n}
{n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пролитая кровь становится последней каплей. Толпа взрывается воем. Они больше не слышат меня — они во власти врага.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The crowd does not answer me. They do not hear me. The sacred promise of death can no longer touch their minds, for they have fallen under the enemy's spell.{/n}
{n}The crowd does not answer me. They do not hear me. The sacred promise of death can no longer touch their minds, for they have fallen under the enemy's spell.{/n}
{n}The crowd does not answer. They do not hear me. The sacred promise of death no longer moves them, for they have fallen under the enemy's spell.{/n}
{n}The crowd does not answer. They do not hear me. The sacred promise of death no longer moves them, for they have fallen under the enemy's spell.{/n}
{n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}
{n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das vergossene Blut wird zum Wendepunkt. Die Menge bricht in Geschrei aus. Sie hört mich nicht mehr, denn der Feind hat sie im Griff.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das vergossene Blut wird zum Wendepunkt. Die Menge bricht in Geschrei aus. Sie hört mich nicht mehr, denn der Feind hat sie im Griff.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La sangre derramada colma el vaso. La muchedumbre estalla en gritos. Ya no me oyen, pues el enemigo los ha atrapado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La sangre derramada colma el vaso. La muchedumbre estalla en gritos. Ya no me oyen, pues el enemigo los ha atrapado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}血が溢れて状況は一変する。群衆が叫び声を上げた。もはやこちらの声は聞こえていない。敵の手の中に彼らがいるせいだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}血が溢れて状況は一変する。群衆が叫び声を上げた。もはやこちらの声は聞こえていない。敵の手の中に彼らがいるせいだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}飞溅的鲜血成为了最后的导火索。人群中爆发出了呐喊声，他们已经不再听我的话了，因为敌人已经攫住了他们的思想。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}飞溅的鲜血成为了最后的导火索。人群中爆发出了呐喊声，他们已经不再听我的话了，因为敌人已经攫住了他们的思想。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sang versé marque un point de rupture. Des cris s'élèvent de la foule. Ils ne m'écoutent plus. L'ennemi les tient en son pouvoir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sang versé marque un point de rupture. Des cris s'élèvent de la foule. Ils ne m'écoutent plus. L'ennemi les tient en son pouvoir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dökülen kan, bardağı taşıran damla oldu. Kalabalık, çığlıklara boğuldu. Beni artık duymuyorlar çünkü düşman onları avcunun içine aldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spilt blood becomes the tipping point. The crowd erupts into cries. They no longer hear me, for the enemy has them in their grasp.{/n}
